parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

recordIndicator.description: It specifies the type of record that is loaded

nregister.description: It specifies the external register identifier through which the instruction is being placed. This is taken from the interface file

nregisterId.description: It specifies the Register ID through which the instruction is being created. Allowed values are from the list of Registers created in MFGI for which the user has rights

fundPromoterIdentifier.description: Its specifies the fund promter ID of the instruction being created. Allowed values are from the list of Fund promoters created in MFGI

noutlet.description: It specifies the external agent identifier of the agent for which the instruction is being placed. This is taken from the interface file

noutletId.description: It specifies Agent ID  linked to the register . Allowed values are from the list of Fund promoters created in MFGI

ninstruction.description: It specifies the MFGI created instruction number which is automatically incremented sequentially per register by MFGI.

frequency.description: Its specifies the frequency for the instruction. LoV is available in Cmess table TA_FREQ_IN

day.description: Its specifies the day of the week when the instruction needs to be exected for frequency Day of the month. LoV is available in Cmess table JOURS

splitType.description: It specifies the allocation method chosen by the register to split the amount to be invested in the funds of the product. LoV is available in Cmess table TA_SPLIT

firstExecDate.description: It specifies First date on which the instruction operation will take place. This date should be equal or superior to the application date

noOfInstallments.description: Number of installments of the plan.

penaltiyAmount.description: It specifies the Amount of penalty fees when the redemption is done before the authorized period

penaltyCurrency.description: It specifies the Currency of the penalty fees. (in 3 letter ISO Code. Eg : EUR).The LoV is available in CMESS tabel MONNAIES. Mandatory if the field Penalty amount is filled in.

period.description: It specifies the Period during which the commission is applicable to the early redemption.

typeRegister.description: It specifies the Register type for Cash Handling.]The LoV is available in CMESS tabel TA_REGIS

settlementType.description: It specifies the Settlement type for Cash Handling. LoV is available in CMESS tabel TA_SETTLE

dealType.description: It specifies the Deal type for Cash Handling. LoV is available in Cmess table TA_DEAL

extCash.description: Flag to specify whether the instruction has external cash movements. Allowed values : Y (to enable), N (to disable), Null (=N)

intCash.description: Flag to specify whether the instruction has Internal cash movements. Allowed values : Y (to enable), N (to disable), Null (=N)

freeText.description: Free text field for user to add any addiotnal information

numberOfDays.description: It specifies the number of days applicable on the specific frequency selected.

numberOfWeeks.description: It specifies the number of weeks applicable on the specific frequency selected.

paymentType.description: It specifies the payment type of the instruction. LoV is available in CMESS tabel TA_PAYTYP

custodySettlement.description: It specifies the Custody settlement of the instruction. LoV is available in CMESS tabel TA_CDELIV

regularDate.description: It specifies the Exact date on which the instruction must be processed. This field is mandatory for the Monthly frequency or blank for the other frequency codes

maturityDate.description: It specifies the Last date on which the instruction will take place. End of the operation/instruction

cancellationDate.description: It specifies the Date on which the shareholder wishes to cancel the instruction.

accountHolderName.description: It specifies the Name of the account holder

bankId.description: It specifies the Bank linked to the account holder. Allowed values are from the Banks created at Central Register level in MFGI.

suspensionFrom.description: It specifies the date from which the saving plan needs to be suspened. The field will be activated only when the operation code 0001-Savings Plan is selected and when the instruction is in status 20-Validated or 60-Suspended

suspensionTo.description: It specifies the date till which the saving plan needs to be suspened. The field will be activated only when the operation code 0001-Savings Plan is selected and when the instruction is in status 20-Validated or 60-Suspended

immediateCancelation.description: Flag to specify if the instruction needs to be cancelled immediately. Allowed values : Y (to enable), N (to disable), Null (=N)

externalUniqueMandateReference.description: It specifies the External unique mandatory ref. The system will perform a uniqueness check on this field
